reviews.review_text: The food is amazing. I ordered pizza shake and fries. One thing that I noticed was there a lot of foreigners coming there. One might get intimidated by that on 31st night. It is a private place so that would be entry only if you have a specific package tour, or if you Are from their community All in All, itâ€™s an amazing place to chill and go with your friends. There are specific places on the table booked only for particular community, which made me feel that it was a biased restaurant high possibility that it was just for that particular day.

Ambience is great for access to the beach you need to walk straight.

We ordered salad and it was pathetic. Orange and Pomegranate juice had no pomegranate and was served in beer glass ðŸ˜” We ordered Garden Quinoa salad- was completely blank no salt no lemon no dressing and tiger prawns salad had small prawns.

So the food experience wasn't great- you can try anything else. The seating is very comfy.

3.7 stars (please read on)

While I went there post reading all the reviews about the staff, delay in service yata yata.

The place has a very chill vibe, where you go to spend a few hours with some very decent food and drinks.

The staff to my amusement and again against the reviews were very accomodative, kind and attentive.

The food was actually great, from the salads to the burger. Everything was delicious. Desserts could have been a step better.

Now, why the 3.7 stars you might wonder, yes, the place attracts a lot of Russian crowd, who really do their own thing.
What disheartened us was we went on a late evening, place was almost empty, there are no 2 seater tables the staff requested us to take a 4/6 seater, however a russian guest/personnel known to the restaurant had an objection to it and came and told the staff why pass it only to a couple.

Staff, to my genuine amusement, kept their word declined the over intrusive and "karen" lady and passed the table.

Wonderful evening/night if not for that lady.

Lastly, please try and get smaller tables for 2/4 seater 99% tables are for groups of 6 and above.
